titlepage.titleproper: A Guide to the Virginia Municipal League Archives 1925-1989
titlepage.subtitle:
A Collection in
Special Collections and Archives, James Branch Cabell Library M 276

defitem.item: Web version of the finding aid funded in part by a grant from the National Endowment for the Humanities.

archdesc.runner: Special Collections and Archives, James Branch Cabell Library, Virginia Commonwealth University

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections and Archives, James Branch Cabell Library, Virginia Commonwealth University

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: Any financial or personnel materials still in the collection are not available for research.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Box/folder, Virginia Municipal League Archives, M 276, Special Collections and Archives, James Branch Cabell Library, Virginia Commonwealth University.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: The Executive Director of the Virginia Municipal League donated the materials to Special Collections and Archives in 1992.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Collection processed in 1991 and revised in 1997.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: This collection contains papers held by the VML. These papers deal with the issues that any municipality would be concerned with. A few examples are public safety, waste water regulations, annexation issues, drug dependency and programs, etc. The main bulk seems to be information dealing with Virginia municipalities complying to federal and state regulations. The collection includes reports, bulletins, publications and legal documents. In addition, the library also receives the VML publication, Town and County; for more up-to-date information.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Collection is arranged by subject and chronological therein.
